## Reproduce Data Processing in TaxAss Paper  
### Download versions of programs and databases used in this paper:
Program       | Version             | Download From
--------------|---------------------|-------------------------  
mothur        | v.1.39.5            | mothur.org  
Silva Seed    | v128                | mothur.org (but included in batch folder here)   
SraToolkit    | 2.7.0-mac64         | ncbi.nlm.nih.gov  
BLAST         | 2.2.31+             | ncbi.nlm.nih.gov  
vsearch       | 2.4.3-macos-x86_64  | github.com/torognes/vsearch
TaxAss        | SHA **??????????**  | github.com/McMahonLab/TaxAss
FreshTrain    | 18Aug2016           | github.com/McMahonLab/TaxAss
Greengenes    | 13_5                | greengenes.secondgenome.com/downloads/database/13_5

pwd
ls

## Download and QC raw data  

The QC folder contains all the necessary starting files and scripts. Script annotations include more details.  
### Mendota: 
```{bash, eval=F}
cd Mendota/
cd QC-Mendota/
./qc_mendota.sh > terminaloutput_mendota.txt
# you can check for error messages in the terminal output file
./deletemothurbarf.sh terminaloutput_mendota.txt > terminaloutput_mendota.txt
```


## Run QC'ed data through TaxAss  
This includes the optional steps of TaxAss, where different pidents are compared and then the best one is chosen.
